profile:
The Home Improvement People have completed literally thousands of renovations since our inception. We are a unique award winning contracting company, consulted by various media as industry experts. 
Please view our website at homeimprovementpeople.com to view images of some of our projects. 
For our clients' convenience, we've implemented progress billing as well as financing.
Regardless of scope, we approach every single home renovation with a foundation of strong design aesthetics, comprehensive product options, sound project management, and a commitment to craftsmanship.
 
Our projects range from remodelled bathrooms and kitchens, to rear additions,  hardwood flooring, basements, second story additions and other extensive renovations. We undertake work in all budget ranges.
 
Choosing a reputable contractor is the most important decision you will make regarding your renovation. From plans and permits, to last little finishing details, The Home Improvement People is committed to completing your renovations and home improvements in a professional manner and to your complete satisfaction.
We take pride in our personalized service and our high quality workmanship. 
Call us for quality, insured work - completed on time, and on budget.
416-782-7605.

profile:
We are a professional engineering team (Architectural, Structural, Mechanical), ready to provide or help you with your building permit package.

Our Expert Services:
For residential:
• Basement Apartment including walk-out entrance.
• Interior Alteration (structural walls change to beams, add a door or window)
• Attached / Detached Garage, Decking, Sunroom and Swimming Pool etc.
• Brand new house or addition. 
• Laneway Suite Permits

For commercial:
Office, Restaurant, Barber Shop, Tea House, Badminton pool, Dentist etc.

Why us:
• Best service of GTA including before and after permit approval!
• Free Consultation!
• All approved and designed by PEO registered Professional Engineers Ontario and British Columbia.
• Any comments received from the city will be addressed with no additional charges.

How we operate:
• Send us a message with your job description and property municipality.
• Receive Quote and book site visit date.
• We arrive to take measurements and site discussion.
• Our design team work on design to ensure the client’s goals are achieved.
• We provide the permit package or apply it on your behalf.

How to contact us:
• Call or Text: (647)-889-9007
• Email: weconsultingcan@gmail.com
services: Residential and commercial designs for building permits.

profile: You need to renovate, or make an addition to your house.  How about photo like pictures of the idea?  We can do that, quickly and inexpensively.  Then when you are happy with the design, we create the required drawings a contractor will need for construction.  You need a building permit for the project?  We can do that for you as well.  In some cased what you need requires a change to a zoning bylaw.  We can represent your case to the committee of adjustment for a variance to the bylaw, which if approved, will  allow the project to go ahead.
services:
Photo realistic images of your concepts and ideas.
Floor plans for houses, ,garages, renovations and additions.
Construction drawings with details so that a contractor can fulfill the reality of your ideas.
Creation of existing building details to ensure the new construction blends in.
AutoCad drawings, if required, to complete your documentation.
PDF copies of the drawings to communicate what is needed to contractors and suppliers.
Specifications of construction details, methods and materials.
warranty_terms: All projects are Ontario Building Code Compliance
